result.html: D'fhógair muid go poiblí éWe announced it publicly.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟógair muid go poiblí éWe announced it publicly.

result.eng: The results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.html: Fógrófar torthaí an chomórtais amárachThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Fógrófar torṫaí an ċomórtais amáraċThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as

result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
